about_the_game:
Solve the Mystery of The Bunker Complex
Players wake up in an abandoned bunker. They must navigate the bunker and find secret passwords to solve the events around them. However, as they progress in the shelter, they encounter traps and monsters. Players must find a way out of the shelter while trying to survive.

Gameplay
The game can be played together by up to two people. They must complete the tasks given to them on the map by escaping from the enemies. Some missions require carrying items, while others require solving puzzles scattered around the map. Scare elements that appear in random places on the map make things difficult for players.

Cinematic Gameplay
A cinematic gameplay with in-game cutscenes, Unexpected horror sequences, Moments that make you experience the tension at its peak.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood, violence and killing. Attacks with knives and similar sharp tools, sudden intimidation elements, severed limbs, blood and human corpses found on the ground.

name: The Bunker Complex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: 'The Bunker Complex' is a 2 player co-op horror game. Players fight for survival in an old bunker.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
